structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY CLASSIFICATION, BOUNDARIES, AND ALTERNATIVE METHOD OF CONSOLIDATING GOVERNMENTAL SERVICES

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 303, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 320, sec. 2. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 42. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3664, 3665, 3666.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Annexation or reduction of territory by sixth-class city.
